content:
Unfortunately I don't have the time to properly do the job of a maintainer of the project anymore, so I decided to leave the team. I apologize for the extra work this will put on the rest of the maintainers. I will go through my assigned PRs and re-assign them.

Thanks to the team for always being so kind and helpful. I've learnt a lot from y'all.
sad to hear about this, thanks for all you've done for Clippy. Take care, I hope we will see you around again :wink:
Don't say leaving, say taking a break. You're always welcome, if you want to come back!
@Eduardo Broto thanks for all your work, and yeah, you're welcome back anytime!

Also I wanna be clear: we don't currently have membership requirements for this team, it is totally okay to stay on the team, be off of the highfive reviewer rotation, and not attend meetings, so you stay on the website and can still weigh in on big decisions like rfcs
the only requirement is that if we have FCPs you should be relatively quick to tick your box, raise concerns, or opt out of participating
But stepping down from the team is also fine. Your choice!

I can just agree with the statements from the others. I've only been around clippy for a short time, but it is clearly visible what effort you and the others have put into the project. I'm super grateful for the work you've done, and I hope that we'll see you around! :upside_down:

@Manish Goregaokar I understand, but I kind of prefer to reflect my current degree of implication this way. It makes it also clear to me :smile:

Thanks everyone for the kind words :heart:
